description: Number of orthogonal lattices in dimension n.
comments: Conjecture (V. Kotesovec, 2010): A007669(n) = A178717(n-1) - 1 [From _Vaclav Kotesovec_, Sep 02 2010]
references: R. L. E. Schwarzenberger, Crystallography in spaces of arbitrary dimension, Proc. Camb. Phil. Soc., 76 (1974), 23-32.
R. L. E. Schwarzenberger, $N$-Dimensional Crystallography. Pitman, London, 1980, p. 65.
N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
